channel.title: The Curious Cases of Vera and Nina
channel.itunes:author: Optimus Prime
channel.itunes:summary: In the Sunset Park neighborhood of Santa Monica, sister sleuths Vera (11) and Nina (8) investigate the quirkiest mysteries around their school, park, and block. Alongside their trusty beagle Bean and their overly dramatic assistant Herman the squirrel, they unravel strange clues, decode neighborly secrets, and stumble into delightfully bizarre adventures. Local, lighthearted, and full of heart — with a mystery in every episode.
